entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Coronach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
